title: SNAP 2024 Results Announced!
image_desc:
A stylized graphic showing a graduation cap with a scroll and the SNAP logo.  Type: illustration

### Video Suggestion:
A short, upbeat video showcasing students celebrating success.
narration: Welcome!  The SNAP 2024 results are finally here. Let's learn how to access your scorecard.

title: Accessing Your SNAP 2024 Scorecard
content:
Visit snaptest.org
Click "SNAP 2024 Result"
Enter SNAP ID and Password
Download your Scorecard
image_desc:
A screenshot of the snaptest.org website showing the login page for SNAP 2024 results. Type: screenshot

### Video Suggestion:
N/A
narration: To access your results, first, visit the official website, snaptest.org.  Then, locate and click on the link for "SNAP 2024 Result." You'll need your SNAP ID and password to log in. Once logged in, you can download your scorecard.

title: Important Information: SNAP 2024
content:
**Column 1: Multiple Attempts**
Up to three attempts allowed
Highest score used for percentile
**Column 2: Normalization Policy**
Question paper difficulty adjusted
No score normalization applied
image_desc:
A graphic showing a bar chart comparing scores from different attempts, highlighting the highest score. Type: chart

### Video Suggestion:
N/A
narration: Remember, candidates could take the SNAP test up to three times.  The highest score from those attempts will determine your final percentile.  Also, while the difficulty of the question papers was adjusted across all three test sessions, no score normalization was applied.
